help-file.title: SLEEP
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <victim> Aggressive: Yes Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Enchantment
A successful spellcast will cause the victim to fall magically asleep for a time. A victim under this spell cannot awaken on their own; they must wait for the spell to wear off or be awoken by taking damage.
